name: Joey Guerra
title: Software Engineering Consultant
summary: Joey is a seasoned software engineer and integration specialist with over 25 years of experience designing and building scalable, adaptable systems. He partners with growth-minded businesses to streamline operations, integrate systems, and develop custom software that evolves with their needs. From aerospace engineering at NASA to modern SaaS platforms, Joey brings a builder’s mindset—valuing simplicity, pragmatism, and tangible results. His recent work includes field operations software for construction, lab management systems for orthodontic manufacturers, and a cloud-native billing platform for an E&S insurance startup.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Served as a consultant enhancing Jack in the Box’s existing .NET and NServiceBus-based integration platform to support ingestion of inventory, product transfers, waste, and invoice data from vendor APIs. Wrote C# and SQL to extend system capabilities and integrate with the company’s financial and analytics systems. Conducted system analysis and vendor API evaluation to design robust integration solutions. Proactively identified gaps in requirements and facilitated alignment through thoughtful questions and clear communication in stakeholder meetings. Collaborated with teams building the next-generation architecture to ensure continuity and smooth integration with legacy systems. Built tooling to facilitate development as the vendors built out their API capabilities.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Developed a modern, event-sourced billing platform for a startup in the Excess & Surplus (E&S) insurance space. The system was built using C#, .NET, Blazor, Azure Functions, Azure Service Bus, and MS SQL Server. Led the design and implementation of the Policy Cancellation module, ensuring regulatory compliance and accurate financial handling of mid-term policy changes. Analyzed existing systems and vendor interfaces, identified integration gaps, and collaborated across teams to align on architecture and execution. Provided technical leadership and clear communication to support the delivery of a scalable, cloud-native billing solution.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Built software to consolidate case information from dentist software into a unified lab workflow system. Implemented event sourcing to track case state, facilitate status visibility, task management, and dentist communications. Archival system used Azure for PDF storage. Led the design and implementation of the shipment and fulfillment system, ensuring accurate tracking and reporting of shipments. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration with existing systems and processes. Provided technical leadership and clear communication to support the delivery of a scalable, cloud-native solution.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Replaced 150+ API services built with and running on MuleSoft with a custom, dotnet solution. The new system was built using C#, .NET, Redis, hosted in a Kubernetes cluster, and was designed to be more efficient and easier to maintain. Implemented GitHub's Scientist approach to run the system with live traffic in parallel with the existing one, which enabled us to go live with no downtime or data loss. The new system was able to handle the same volume of requests as the old system, but with less overhead and better performance, reducing hosting costs.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Worked with the GameStop team to integrate their warehouses with SAP. The system was built using C#, .NET, and Redis, and was designed for high througput. Worked providing clarity on existing capabilities and flushing out business cases in order to build the right integrations to SAP.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Built a survey system to capture provider feedback.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Worked with the TradeStation team to move their US exchange system to AWS on Windows VM.

experiences.title: Technical Principal
experiences.description: Developed a business case to replace Catepillar's aging Order Management System that integrates with their dealers and 70+ manufacturing plants.

experiences.title: Technical Principal
experiences.description: Designed architecture for log file ingestion for their security analysis product.

experiences.title: Technical Principal
experiences.description: Investigated using Machine Learning to classify mortgage related documents and automate the process of extracting data from them. Worked with the team identify different solutions and options.

experiences.title: Technical Principal
experiences.description: Developed mobile development standards and best practices for the team to utilize with their contractors and vendors.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Manager
experiences.description: Managed engineering teams responsible for product pages and APIs. Led cloud migration, merged mobile and desktop site codebases, and championed XP practices. Built trust across distributed teams.

experiences.title: Development Manager
experiences.description: Managed the GameInfomer tech team. Led development of GI's CRM tool, social networking site, digital magazine integration and PowerUp Rewards program.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Built and maintained the True.com dating site. Developed the video chatting platform.

experiences.title: Lead Product Developer
experiences.description: Led the design and development of Legal Discovery, the ad-hoc reporting application for the flagship product (Corprasoft Legal Desktop), used in Fortune 500 legal departments for case management. In addition to professional services engagements, providing support and customizations. First Scrum team.

experiences.title: Software Engineer
experiences.description: Built and maintained the WQN.com website integrated to a telephony switch, a web-based application to order and manage long distance calling PINs. Built check-cashing and CRM for customer service. Developed fraud tracking systems and reporting.

experiences.title: Software Engineering Consultant
experiences.description: Built a warehouse inventory management system for book covers.

experiences.title: Data Modeler

experiences.description: Developed data models for online auto insurance rate quoting

experiences.title: Aerospace Engineer
experiences.description: Worked at NASA / Johnson Space Center on the International Space Station and other projects, applying engineering principles to real-world systems. Learned rigorous testing, systems thinking, and mission-critical decision making.
